Huang, Lynn

Olmedo, Monica, Prerequisite: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: This section is part of the Puente Learning Community. Students must also enroll in COUNS-130-6450 and LT-121-5416. For more information, email Brenda Gonzalez at bgonzalez@dvc.edu. Note: Class meets on-campus as scheduled.

Gonzales, Anthony, Prerequisite: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: This section is part of the Puente Learning Community. Students must also enroll in COUNS-130-6452 and LT-121-5418. For more information, email Brenda Gonzalez at bgonzalez@dvc.edu. Note: Class meets on-campus as scheduled.

DuLaney-Greger, Keri, Prerequisite: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: This section is part of the PACE program. Students must be a PACE student to enroll. For program information, go to www.dvc.edu/pace. Note: 100% online course - no required online meetings. Instruction will be provided through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to begin.

Ang, Lisa, Prerequisite: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: This section is an optional part of DVC's Umoja Program. Students must be a current or former student in the Umoja program to enroll. For program and registration information, please visit www.dvc.edu/umoja. Note: Partially online course with required meetings Tuesdays, 11:10 AM-12:35 PM (on-campus, see room on schedule) with all other instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.
